sqlMap.sql: select * from sys_user where uname=:uname and upwd=:upwd and del=0 and SECURITY_LEVEL=0
select * from sys_resource where del=0 order by seq asc

select * from sys_user where del=0 <#if dpnum?exists && dpnum!=""> AND dpnum= :dpnum </#if> <#if uname?exists && uname!=""> AND uname like concat('%',:uname,'%') </#if> <#if phone?exists && phone!=""> AND phone like concat('%',:phone,'%') </#if>
select * from sys_user where del=0 <#if id?exists && id!=""> AND id= :id </#if>
delete from sys_user where id=:id and id not in (1)

select a.ID, a.UNAME, a.UPWD, a.ENO, a.GENDER, a.TEL, a.PHONE, a.EMAIL, a.DEL, a.SECURITY_LEVEL, a.WEBCHAT, a.QQ, a.USR_STATUS, a.SMS_NOTITFY, a.PHOTO_PATH, a.QRCODE_PATH, a.ADDRESS, a.DPNUM, a.JOB, a.NOW_ADDRESS, a.NICE_NAME, a.CREATE_TIME, a.UPDATE_USER_ID, a.UPDATE_TIME, a.CREATE_USER_ID, a.EXP_POINTS, a.remark, a.idcode, a.birthdate, (select c.id from bbs_signin c where c.CREATE_USER_ID=a.id and DATE_FORMAT(c.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') limit 1) as isCheck from sys_user a where a.email=:email and a.upwd=:upwd and a.del=0 and a.SECURITY_LEVEL>0
update sys_user set exp_points=exp_points+:expPoints where id=:createUserId
update sys_user set exp_points=exp_points-:expPoints where id=:createUserId
update sys_user set photo_path=:photoPath where id=:id
select id from sys_user where email=:email
